item.description: The Watertown Library only has reservation during summer hours from 10am to 1:45pm, so I'm moving this one up a little bit for the MetroWest Crowd, which will be upstairs in the conference room as last month. There will be parrallel events @ Pandemonium at noon, and maybe folks can use the free RPG event at Toys and Things up north as a similar venue for folks that don't want or can't come into town. Let's see how that works out and if we have a larger turn out or if it starts to take away from the overall crowd.

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group Monthly Meetup
